page.title: 19LOCAL PERSONALITY
page.content: Mr.Hill worked at Wiveliscombe Secondary Modern as a general duties teacher until a careers post was created in 1962.In those days a child had only to chose the type of job and suitable locality. The oil crisis of 1974 caused the warning light to flicker and from 1977 the employment screw tightened.However small employers kept in touch with Kingsmead Comprehensive as it now was. Friendly relationships were strengthened by careers evenings and regular talks,not only by potential employers but representatives of the 16+ educational establishments in Taunton.Mr.Hill's record of success where no one has left without a job or place for training or F.E. has won coverage by the national media and won him the M.B.E.in the 1984 Birthday Honours list.
